channel.title: FireRune is looking for staff!
channel.description:
Dear developers,
FireRune is currently looking for some PHP scripters if you would like to join our development team please post a comment.
Please remember we are only interested in people who are good at coding PHP so that our website can be coded faster, you will be posted on the staff list.
Also please remember you will be a free worker and will not get any payments.
Please fill out a form like this:
Years doing PHP: Rate yourself: 1/10 Name:
Proof that our development will succeed can be found on this topic:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471822.0.html
ModFireHeart (Mod Tucker) & FireRune Staff
